title: About Me
description: I am Valerio and I am a Software Engineer from Italy. For the last years I have been living in Zurich where working for companies of different sizes, from big corporates to startups which space in different domains from web banking to finance, IOT and Ecommerce.
description2: I strive for high quality architecture, technical design and agile processes. I bring a lot of experience in products with particular attention to frontend and user experience. I am an energetic person with a strong educational background which makes me adapt quickly to new challenges and technologies.
description3: In my freetime I love to do mountain sports like skiing, climbing and hiking. Other thing I love are eating and cooking, guess it's DNA, traveling and photography. I wish to travel all the world one day.
